timeline.bodyText: I have no idea what dryRun does. Javadoc would be nice on the parameter
timeline.author: i509VCB
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,4 +1,14 @@
 CLASS net/minecraft/class_1262 net/minecraft/inventory/Inventories
+	METHOD method_29234 remove (Lnet/minecraft/class_1263;Ljava/util/function/Predicate;IZ)I
+		ARG 0 inventory

+		ARG 2 maxCount
+		ARG 3 dryRun

replies.bodyText: Hmm, don't people know that a dry run is a simulation run? I am surprised that you haven't heard of the term.
replies.author: liach

replies.bodyText: I know the concept, just not what it does in this context
replies.author: i509VCB

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            			COMMENT If set to true, it returns the number of items which satisfy the condition without actually removing them.
          
          
            
            			COMMENT whether to return the number of items which would have been removed without actually removing them
